mapper.insert: insert into product(idx, filename, ptype, pname, pcontent, capacity, cost) values(seq_idx.nextval, #{filename},#{ptype},#{pname},#{pcontent},#{capacity},#{cost})
mapper.select: select idx,filename,pname,capacity,cost from product where ptype='위스키'
